narration_text: Emerging from the grimy alleyway, Sinbad finds himself on the edge of Z-City's main street. The atmosphere shifts from unsettling quiet to a low hum of activity. Buildings rise tall, casting long shadows, but the street itself is surprisingly devoid of people. A few overturned cars and shattered windows hint at recent chaos. A peculiar sight catches your eye: a lone hot dog vendor stands patiently by his cart, seemingly unfazed by the surroundings. The air carries a strange mix of exhaust fumes and…something vaguely reptilian.

dialogue.speaker: Hot Dog Vendor
dialogue.text: Hey there, pal. Welcome to Z-City. Care for a dog? Best in the…well, only game in town right now.

options: Head further down the main street.

active_objectives.description: Understand your surroundings and determine how you arrived in Z-City.

major_events: Sinbad reached the main street of Z-City.

history_entry: Sinbad exits the alleyway and arrives on Z-City's main street. He encounters a hot dog vendor amidst signs of recent monster attacks.

ambient_events.description: A distant, guttural roar echoes through the city.

world_info.name: One Punch Man
world_info.description: A world plagued by monsters and protected by heroes, where power levels are often absurd and the strongest hero can defeat any enemy with a single punch.

exits: West: Leads back to the alleyway.
North: Continues down the main street.
